mapper.sql: id, hmid, `type`, monitdate, hospdate, hospstatus, hospoperator, inid, `status`, `operator`, modifydate, remark, checkstatus, checkdate, checkoperator, checkreason
mapper.insert: insert into monitorlist (id, hmid, `type`, monitdate, hospdate, hospstatus, hospoperator, inid, `status`, `operator`, modifydate, remark, checkstatus, checkdate, checkoperator, checkreason) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hmid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{monitdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{hospdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{hospstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hospoperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{checkoperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update monitorlist
hmid = #{hmid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
monitdate = #{monitdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
hospdate = #{hospdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
hospstatus = #{hospstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hospoperator = #{hospoperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inid = #{inid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`operator` = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modifydate = #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checkstatus = #{checkstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checkdate = #{checkdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
checkoperator = #{checkoperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checkreason = #{checkreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update monitorlist set hmid = #{hmid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, monitdate = #{monitdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, hospdate = #{hospdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, hospstatus = #{hospstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hospoperator = #{hospoperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inid = #{inid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `operator` = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifydate = #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, checkstatus = #{checkstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, checkdate = #{checkdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, checkoperator = #{checkoperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, checkreason = #{checkreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN hospstatus='0' OR hospstatus='9' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS hn FROM monitorlist WHERE status='1' AND DATE_FORMAT(monitdate,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') AND hmid = #{id}
mapper.update:
update monitorlist h
-- h.hospnum=(Select Count(1) From monitorlist m Where m.status='1' and (m.hospstatus='0' or m.hospstatus='9') and DATE_FORMAT(m.monitdate,'%Y-%m-%d') < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') and m.hmid=h.id ),
h.hospstatus = #{hospstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
h.remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where h.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
